Package org.aion.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAccount
    This interface dedicate to account manipulations.
    IAdmin
    This interface dedicate to contact with Aion kernel for certain purpose.
    IAionAPI
    IAionAPI contains the majority of methods to interact with the Aion Kernel.
    IChain
    This interface provides methods for fetching blockchain specific details such as blocks and transactions.
    IContract
    A Contract class that sits above the Aion Java API layer that provides the user with convenient methods of encoding and decoding contract calls and transactions from the Aion Kernel.
    IContractController
    This interface provides methods for deploy the contract to the Aion blockchain network, store the contract into the contract container, retrieve the contract and remove the contract.
    IMine
    This interface provides methods for fetching the miner statistics such as mining and Hashrate.
    INet
    This interface provides methods for fetching the Aion blockchain network status and the specific information.
    ITx
    ITx is an interface of the class Transaction.
    IUtils
    IUtils is an interface class that provides common utility methods.
    IWallet
    This interface is an interface for the class Wallet.
